rules.description: 21/22.edit(Eisu + X/C/V/a/z/b/e/o to Cut/Copy/Paste/sel all/undo/redo/kill line/open line
11/12. scroll-delete(Eisu + H/D/M/O to bs/delete/scroll down/scroll up)
04/04.symbol shift (Kana + shift + Z/X/C/comma/period/slash to grave/double quote/{/}/pipe)
32/32.modifiers R_Control or eisuu / R_Option or kana / shift or space / isshift 1 or paste /  2 or fn / param 3 or sel all :from eisu / kana / space / v / semicolon / a
